Original summary: "IncompatibleClassChangeError loading org.eclipse.core.runtime"

This actually is not related to runtime. Since M6, the runtime appears as the
"culprit" in log entries for any exception thrown from running a safe runnable
(Platform#run). Seems to be related to the instrumentation work in the UI team.

I see the same stack trace using M7 and instrumentation 1.0.5. 

Steve Polyak

The problem appears to be in the constructor of the InstrumentationHandle 
class. Line 132. The File templateFile variable isn't getting a properly 
configured path which results in a plugin parse error. The template attribute 
in the instumentation markup appears to be specified correctly (according to 
the documentation) i.e. template="template.xrpt".

Steve Polyak
Pearson Educational Measurement
